mapper.sql: SELECT USER_NO, PARTNER_NAME, PARTNER_TYPE, PHONE, OPEN_TIME, IMAGE_ORI, IMAGE_RE, ABOUT, STATUS FROM PARTNER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTNER ( USER_NO, PARTNER_NAME, PARTNER_TYPE, PHONE, OPEN_TIME, IMAGE_ORI, IMAGE_RE, ABOUT, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{partnerName}, #{partnerType}, #{phone}, #{openTime}, #{imageOri}, #{imageRe}, #{about}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT P.USER_NO, P.PARTNER_TYPE, P.PARTNER_NAME, P.IMAGE_ORI, P.IMAGE_RE, M.ADDRESS, P.PHONE, P.OPEN_TIME FROM PARTNER P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.PARTNER_TYPE = '병원'

SELECT P.USER_NO, P.PARTNER_TYPE, P.PARTNER_NAME, P.IMAGE_ORI, P.IMAGE_RE, M.ADDRESS, P.PHONE, P.OPEN_TIME FROM PARTNER P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.PARTNER_TYPE = '유치원'

SELECT P.USER_NO, P.PARTNER_TYPE, P.PARTNER_NAME, P.IMAGE_ORI, P.IMAGE_RE, M.ADDRESS, P.PHONE, P.OPEN_TIME FROM PARTNER P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.PARTNER_TYPE = '샵'

SELECT ROWNUM, USER_NAME, USER_NO, PARTNER_NAME, PARTNER_TYPE, PHONE,OPEN_TIME,IMAGE_ORI,IMAGE_RE,ABOUT,STATUS,ADDRESS FROM ( SELECT M.USER_NAME, P.USER_NO, P.PARTNER_NAME, P.PARTNER_TYPE, P.PHONE, P.OPEN_TIME, P.IMAGE_ORI, P.IMAGE_RE, P.ABOUT, P.STATUS, M.ADDRESS FROM PARTNER P JOIN MEMBER M ON (P.USER_NO=M.USER_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'W' ) ORDER BY ROWNUM
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTNER WHERE STATUS='N'

SELECT ROWNUM, USER_NAME, USER_NO, PARTNER_NAME, PARTNER_TYPE, PHONE,OPEN_TIME,IMAGE_ORI,IMAGE_RE,ABOUT,STATUS,ADDRESS FROM ( SELECT M.USER_NAME, P.USER_NO, P.PARTNER_NAME, P.PARTNER_TYPE, P.PHONE, P.OPEN_TIME, P.IMAGE_ORI, P.IMAGE_RE, P.ABOUT, P.STATUS, M.ADDRESS FROM PARTNER P JOIN MEMBER M ON (P.USER_NO=M.USER_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'N' ) ORDER BY ROWNUM
